entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 19 except 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High 19 except 8 along parts of the coast. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 16 April 2023
